## Partion weather data

In this section we partition the data bt age in non-mutually ewxcksuve sets.  The sets are defined by age.  The sets are

* Last 7 days 


```{r}
################################################################################
# Keep only last seven days
################################################################################

first_date <- today() - 7

last_007_days_weather <-           # Keep only the last 7 days weather ...
    weather %>% 
    filter( date >= first_date )

last_007_days_weather
```
* Last 30 days

```{r}
first_date <- today() - 30

last_030_days_weather <-           # Keep only the last 30 days weather ...
    weather %>% 
    filter( date >= first_date )

last_030_days_weather
```
